title: Textile, late 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller; glazed chintz
description: Section from a curtain, glazed chintz, roller printed in shades of brown and cream. On light brown ground large clusters of hydrangea blossoms and foliage in cream and darker brown, in perpendicular arrangement.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, late 19th century.
late 19th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller; glazed chintz. Gift of Harold M. Bailey. 1960-79-33.
